statements: SELECT * FROM advertising_guidelines;
SELECT platform_name, advertising_rules FROM advertising_guidelines;
SELECT id, ethical_standards FROM advertising_guidelines;
SELECT * FROM advertising_guidelines WHERE platform_name='Facebook';
SELECT id, advertising_rules, ethical_standards FROM advertising_guidelines WHERE id=2;
SELECT * FROM advertising_guidelines WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY platform_name DESC, ethical_standards ASC
SELECT id, advertising_rules FROM advertising_guidelines WHERE platform_name = 'Google'
SELECT platform_name, ethical_standards FROM advertising_guidelines WHERE id IN (3, 6, 9)
SELECT * FROM advertising_guidelines WHERE ethical_standards LIKE '%honesty%' OR advertising_rules LIKE '%compliance%'
SELECT id, platform_name, ethical_standards FROM advertising_guidelines ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM advertising_guidelines;
SELECT advertiser_name, ad_content FROM advertising_guidelines WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ar_platforms ORDER BY platform_name DESC;
SELECT platform_name, platform_type FROM ar_platforms WHERE id > 3;
SELECT id, platform_name, user_feedback FROM ar_platforms WHERE platform_type = 'Social';
SELECT * FROM advertising_guidelines WHERE id = 1;
SELECT advertiser_name, guidelines FROM advertising_guidelines WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY advertiser_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_guidelines FROM advertising_guidelines;
SELECT platform_name, platform_type AS type FROM ar_platforms WHERE user_feedback LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT AVG(id) AS avg_id, AVG(length(ad_content)) AS avg_ad_length FROM advertising_guidelines;
SELECT id, guideline_title FROM Guidelines;
SELECT ad_name, platform, created_at FROM Advertisements;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, ad_content FROM Advertisements ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM Users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Guidelines WHERE id = 1;
SELECT guideline_title, description FROM Guidelines WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, ad_name, platform FROM Advertisements ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM Users WHERE role = 'Admin' ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ad_type, ad_content FROM Advertisements WHERE platform = 'Facebook' AND ad_type = 'Banner';
SELECT * FROM guidelines;
SELECT id, description, category FROM guidelines WHERE category='Health';
SELECT id, name, industry FROM advertisers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, title FROM ads WHERE advertiser_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM guidelines WHERE category = 'Marketing';
SELECT id, description FROM guidelines WHERE id = 3;
SELECT name, industry FROM advertisers ORDER BY industry DESC;
SELECT id, name, start_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT title, ad_content, name FROM ads JOIN advertisers ON ads.advertiser_id = advertisers.id;
SELECT * FROM guidelines
SELECT category, description FROM guidelines ORDER BY category DESC
SELECT name, website FROM advertisers WHERE email='example@gmail.com'
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT content, advertiser_id FROM ad_content WHERE advertiser_id = 1 ORDER BY content
SELECT * FROM guidelines ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT description, category FROM guidelines WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY category ASC
SELECT name, email, website FROM advertisers WHERE id = 5
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY start_date
SELECT content FROM ad_content INNER JOIN advertisers ON ad_content.advertiser_id = advertisers.id WHERE name = 'Example Advertiser'
